nodes.bodyText: Do we want to disable this rule or was this just somehow for the release?
And if we don't want to have it why not deleting it?
Nice catch. We only disabled it temporarily for debugging, its supposd to be renabled,
Inconsistent API - to set it to false I need to change the field directly, to set to true there is a setter. I suggest either remove the setter or add a parameter to it
Made API clearer, inherting builders should only be able to set it to true so changed the name of the "setter" and made the variable private.
